DOC.brief_summary: This 12 week placebo control clinical trial test individual combined effect antidepressant medication cognitive behavioral therapy chronic back pain .
DOC.detailed_description: This 4 arm 12 week randomize clinical trial compare efficacy 1 ) low concentration desipramine ( < 60 ng/ml ) ; 2 ) cognitive behavioral therapy ; 3 ) low concentration desipramine + cognitive behavioral therapy ; 4 ) placebo medication ( benzotropine mesylate ) .
DOC.criteria: Chronic back pain ( daily pain > 6 month ) Major medical condition might contraindicate antidepressant treatment
